title: Bug 71811AJDoc: should be able to set encoding like javadoc
description: ajdoc doesn't support the encoding docencoding and charset options of javadoc.Especially, it doesn't pass on the encoding to ajc.If your project uses a source file encoding (e.g. UTF8)differing form the platform standard, and some java identifiersuse characters byond the standard ASCII range, you won't be ableto use ajdoc at all.
